languages.text: "Воистину, и эта находка стоила Гильдии шестидесяти восьми душ. Там была настоящая давка, они натравили на нас монстров, но... Сложно напугать тех, кто видел очаг возгорания в арсенальном отсеке".
"We have. This discovery cost the guild sixty-eight souls. It was crowded in those tunnels. They set monsters on us, but... Few things can scare someone who has seen a fire in the arsenal bay."
languages.original_text: "Воистину, и эта находка стоила Гильдии шестидесяти восьми душ. Там была настоящая давка, они натравили на нас монстров, но... Сложно напугать тех, кто видел очаг возгорания в арсенальном отсеке".

languages.text: « En effet. Cette découverte a coûté soixante-huit âmes à notre guilde. Il faut dire que ces tunnels étaient assez étroits. Ils nous ont envoyé leurs monstres, mais... quand on a eu l'occasion de voir un feu dans la baie d'artillerie, croyez-moi, on n'a plus peur de grand-chose. »
languages.original_text: "We have. This discovery cost the guild sixty-eight souls. It was crowded in those tunnels. They set monsters on us, but... Few things can scare someone who has seen a fire in the arsenal bay."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Cette découverte a coûté soixante-huit âmes à notre guilde. Il faut dire que ces tunnels étaient assez étroits. Ils nous ont envoyé leurs monstres, mais... quand on a eu l'occasion de voir un feu dans la baie d'artillerie, croyez-moi, on n'a plus peur de grand-chose. »

languages.text: «Así es. El descubrimiento ha costado sesenta y ocho almas al gremio. Los túneles estaban repletos. Azuzaron a los monstruos contra nosotros, pero... no muchas cosas asustan a gente que ha visto fuego en la bahía del arsenal».
languages.original_text: "We have. This discovery cost the guild sixty-eight souls. It was crowded in those tunnels. They set monsters on us, but... Few things can scare someone who has seen a fire in the arsenal bay."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. El descubrimiento ha costado sesenta y ocho almas al gremio. Los túneles estaban repletos. Azuzaron a los monstruos contra nosotros, pero... no muchas cosas asustan a gente que ha visto fuego en la bahía del arsenal».

languages.text: “是啊，我们损失了六十八位公会成员，才找到了那个洞。隧道很狭窄，那群家伙还派怪物来对付我们，不过……我们都是见识过军械库甲板火灾的人，这种小场面可吓不住我们。”
languages.original_text: "We have. This discovery cost the guild sixty-eight souls. It was crowded in those tunnels. They set monsters on us, but... Few things can scare someone who has seen a fire in the arsenal bay."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，我们损失了六十八位公会成员，才找到了那个洞。隧道很狭窄，那群家伙还派怪物来对付我们，不过……我们都是见识过军械库甲板火灾的人，这种小场面可吓不住我们。”

languages.text: 「はい。この発見をするにあたって、68人のギルドの魂を失いました。あのトンネルは混んでいた。彼らはモンスターを仕掛けましたが…工廠湾の火事を見た者たちを怖がらせられるものなど、ほぼないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "We have. This discovery cost the guild sixty-eight souls. It was crowded in those tunnels. They set monsters on us, but... Few things can scare someone who has seen a fire in the arsenal bay."

traits.locale_text: 「はい。この発見をするにあたって、68人のギルドの魂を失いました。あのトンネルは混んでいた。彼らはモンスターを仕掛けましたが…工廠湾の火事を見た者たちを怖がらせられるものなど、ほぼないでしょう」

languages.text: "Ja. Diese Entdeckung hat die Gilde achtundsechzig Seelen gekostet. Es war eng in diesen Tunneln. Sie haben Monster auf uns gehetzt, aber ... Wer ein Feuer im Arsenalmodul erlebt hat, dem macht nur noch wenig Angst."
languages.original_text: "We have. This discovery cost the guild sixty-eight souls. It was crowded in those tunnels. They set monsters on us, but... Few things can scare someone who has seen a fire in the arsenal bay."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Diese Entdeckung hat die Gilde achtundsechzig Seelen gekostet. Es war eng in diesen Tunneln. Sie haben Monster auf uns gehetzt, aber ... Wer ein Feuer im Arsenalmodul erlebt hat, dem macht nur noch wenig Angst."

languages.text: "Evet. Bu keşfimiz, loncada altmış sekiz zayiata mal oldu. Tüneller çok kalabalıktı. Canavarlar üzerimize doluştu ancak... Cephanelik bölümünde yangın çıktığına şahit olmuş birini korkutabilecek fazla şey yoktur."
languages.original_text: "We have. This discovery cost the guild sixty-eight souls. It was crowded in those tunnels. They set monsters on us, but... Few things can scare someone who has seen a fire in the arsenal bay."
